select #time#, nvl(sgsn.co_name, 'NN('||sgsn.co_gid||')')"SGSN name", #keys#, decode(#first_tmp_table#.tc_id, '0', 'background', '1', 'interactive THP 1', '2', 'interactive THP 2', '3', 'interactive THP 3', '4', 'streaming', '5', 'conversational',#first_tmp_table#.tc_id) "TC", decode(#first_tmp_table#.bc_id, '0', '32 kbps', '1', '64 kbps', '2', '136 kbps', '3', '256 kbps', '4', '512 kbps', '5', '1 Mbps', '6', '1,5 Mbps', '7', '2 Mbps', '8', '4 Mbps', '9', '6 Mbps', '10', '8 Mbps', '11', '12 Mbps', '12', '16 Mbps', '13', '21 Mbps', '14', '28 Mbps', '15', '42 Mbps', '16', '46 Mbps', '17', '84 Mbps', '18', '168 Mbps', #first_tmp_table#.bc_id) "BC", #kpis# from utp_common_objects sgsn, utp_common_objects o_plmn #tmp_meas_tables# where sgsn.co_parent_gid = o_plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.sgsn_gid = sgsn.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(sgsn.co_name, 'NN('||sgsn.co_gid||')')"SGSN name", sevr.severity "Severity", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects sgsn, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr #tmp_meas_tables# where sgsn.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.sgsn_gid = sgsn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(sgsn.co_name, 'NN('||sgsn.co_gid||')')"SGSN name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects sgsn, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp #tmp_meas_tables# where sgsn.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.sgsn_gid = sgsn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(sgsn.co_name, 'NN('||sgsn.co_gid||')')"SGSN name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", alrm.ALARM "Alarm", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects sgsn, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp, (select alr.alarm_id, nvl(alr.text, 'NN('||alr.alarm_id||')') alarm from REPALS_D_ALARM_MEMBERS alr) alrm #tmp_meas_tables# where sgsn.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.sgsn_gid = sgsn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_id = alrm.alarm_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#
